## Description {#details}

This is a MessagePack reader.

See <a href="https://github.com/msgpack/msgpack/blob/master/spec.md">https://github.com/msgpack/msgpack/blob/master/spec.md</a> for the full standard.

Typical usage: 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">     StringRef input = GetInput();</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">     msgpack::Reader MPReader(input);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">     msgpack::Object Obj;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">   </span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">       Expected&lt;bool&gt; ReadObj = MPReader.read(&amp;Obj);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ReadObj)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle error...</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ReadObj.get())</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reached end of input</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Obj.Kind) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> msgpack::Type::Int:</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       // Use Obj.Int</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">       </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">       &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">     &#125;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Reads MessagePack objects from memory, one at a time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msgpack/reader"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msgpack/reader/#a3ee641a54e5b81c096f00f0dea4a9020">Reader</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Read one object from the input buffer, advancing past it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The \\p Obj is updated with the kind of the object read, and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// corresponding union member is updated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For the collection objects (Array and Map), only the length is read, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the caller must make and additional \\c N calls (in the case of Array) or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\c N&#42;2 calls (in the case of Map) to \\c Read to retrieve the collection</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// elements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param &#91;out&#93; Obj filled with next object on success.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns true when object successfully read, false when at end of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// input (and so \\p Obj was not updated), otherwise an error.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;bool&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msgpack/reader/#a4f20ee2ca37e3839b73900aef8e26ac5">read</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/msgpack/object">Object</a> &amp;Obj);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a20d37563688a61a452fb26e317e37308">StringRef::iterator</a> End;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> remainingSpace() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The rest of the code maintains the invariant that End &gt;= Current, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that this cast is always defined behavior.</span></CodeLine>
